dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: So, you dare to tread the sacred grounds of Anubis? State your business or be judged by the ancient powers.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to harness the power of these ancient ruins. Stand aside or be destroyed.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your arrogance is matched only by your insolence. The powers you seek are not for the unworthy. Prepare for combat or reconsider your folly.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will pry the powers of these ruins from your cold, stone grasp.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You have made your choice. The ancient judgment is cast upon you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: So be it. Face your demise.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Foolish mortal. You shall be crushed under the weight of eternal stone.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You will regret standing in my way.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Regret is for the weak. The judgment is nigh.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: On second thought, there may be room for negotiation.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Negotiation? Your terms may align with ancient wisdom. Speak now, if you dare.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Let us form an alliance. Together, we shall wield the powers hidden within these ruins.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: An alliance with a mortal? Intriguing. Prove your worthiness, and the ancient powers may consider it.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your ancient wisdom must see the advantage in aiding my cause.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Hm, perhaps there is merit in your words. Speak your proposal.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no desire to fight, but your interference cannot be tolerated.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your resolve is admirable, yet the ancient judgment will not be swayed.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: If you will not yield, then prepare for battle.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it. The sands of time shift to your end.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: It seems we're at an impasse. Farewell.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Leave now, and return nevermore. Our paths shall not cross again.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have come to learn from the ancient ones. Share your wisdom with me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge of the ancients is not given freely. Prove your worthiness and you may earn it.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am worthy. Test me, and you shall see.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: The test of worthiness is ancient and unforgiving. Ready yourself.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am prepared for any trial.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Then let the trial commence. Prove yourself or fall.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Perhaps another time. Farewell.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your departure signals weakness. Do not return.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: The knowledge I seek could benefit us both.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Self-interest is not unknown to these ruins. Persuade us further.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Together, we can unlock the secrets that lie within.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Unity over ambition. Perhaps, a shared pursuit.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: There is power here that could restore balance to the realms.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Balance through ancient power is a noble goal. We may align.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Very well. I shall seek knowledge elsewhere.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Another path awaits you, distant from these halls. Leave now.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Anubis, you appear mighty. Join me in my conquest for eternal night.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your ambition is vast. But what would Anubis gain from aiding you?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Together, our might would be unparalleled. The realms would fall before us.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your offer is tempting. Yet, ambition must be weighed against ancient bonds.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Think carefully, Anubis. The power within these ruins and beyond awaits us.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your words stir ancient curiosity. A hesitant alliance, perhaps.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Do not hesitate. Join me, or be left behind.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Impertinence shall not be rewarded. Faceless shadows protect us.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Eternal night would bring new dominion and the revival of ancient powers.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Revival of powers, you say? Such a possibility demands inspection.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: The revival shall be our legacy. Join me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Legacy shared may become reality. I am intrigued by your vision.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: If curiosity is beyond you, then face my wrath.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your threats echo in stone. Prepare for judgment.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: On second thought, I see you are unworthy of my cause.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: An unworthy mortal speaks of unworthiness? The sands shall shift without you.
